title: Redesigning an Elementary Math Expert Development Program Based on E-Portfolios

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics instruction experience and professional practical expertise
context.additional_context: Blended program for in-service elementary teachers to deepen mathematical expertise, featuring personal device integration and summative assessment-centered operations

learning_goals: Learners systematically document and analyze cases linking mathematical theory to practical applications using e-portfolios
Learners present three or more innovative strategies for solving math education field problems in their portfolios upon program completion
Learners maintain reflective journals based on portfolio artifacts, incorporating peer and instructor feedback at least weekly
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
